channel.title: Emotional Songs
channel.description:
Okay so I don't know why, but I love listening to emotional songs that make you on the verge of tearing up. Idk why these few songs make me sad, but they do.
Skrillex - With your friends (long drive) Seether - Rise above this Thriving Ivory - Angels on the moon Incubus - Dig Sleeping with Sirens - Let love bleed red
Those are just a few, but I wanna hear what you guys listen to that are like this.

item.title: Emotional Songs

item.title: Emotional Songs
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:30, topic:411550”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=512806.msg3722853#msg3722853 date=1314061676]

People can’t become possessed… Furthermore, people cut themselves as an attention seeking act/way to relieve emotional pain - it’s related to a personality disorder (the name slips my mind).

I did not do it for attention? I did it because it felt like I didn’t have someone to turn to, I don’t see the logic in people thinking when someone does it for attention, and even if they were, I would help them so they don’t kill their self instead of complaining about someone wanting attention, maybe their tired of hiding?

I don’t exactly want to get into a personal debate with you, but consider this:

You have no one to turn to
You obviously want someone to turn to
Perhaps subconsciously you reasoned that by inflicting wounds to yourself, someone would come to your rescue (by seeing said wounds)

Yes, that might be true, but I don’t find it as attention seeking in terms of wanting to show-off. In no kind of ways did I want every fucking person up my ass telling me don’t do it, when the obvious is clear to me, but it’s not that I did want to do it, it’s that I couldn’t help it, and I had nothing else to turn to.

Therapists and what not do not help much because they don’t usually go through the same thing, so really if we do get help, it doesn’t really help at all thus turning back to what we went to in the first place to ease the pain a little.
[/quote]
By attention-seeking I don’t mean said person wished for everyone in the world to know.[/quote]
Then my apologies for jumping to a conclusion and blowing off on you, it just irritates me when people take it that way, and the way you quoted that post and “fixed” it, irritated me as well.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:29, topic:411550”][quote author=t4 link=topic=512806.msg3722850#msg3722850 date=1314061503]

People can’t become possessed… Furthermore, people cut themselves as an attention seeking act/way to relieve emotional pain - it’s related to a personality disorder (the name slips my mind).

I did not do it for attention? I did it because it felt like I didn’t have someone to turn to, I don’t see the logic in people thinking when someone does it for attention, and even if they were, I would help them so they don’t kill their self instead of complaining about someone wanting attention, maybe their tired of hiding?

I don’t exactly want to get into a personal debate with you, but consider this:

You have no one to turn to
You obviously want someone to turn to
Perhaps subconsciously you reasoned that by inflicting wounds to yourself, someone would come to your rescue (by seeing said wounds)
[/quote]
Yes, that might be true, but I don’t find it as attention seeking in terms of wanting to show-off. In no kind of ways did I want every fucking person up my ass telling me don’t do it, when the obvious is clear to me, but it’s not that I did want to do it, it’s that I couldn’t help it, and I had nothing else to turn to.

Therapists and what not do not help much because they don’t usually go through the same thing, so really if we do get help, it doesn’t really help at all thus turning back to what we went to in the first place to ease the pain a little.[/quote]
By attention-seeking I don’t mean said person wishes for everyone in the world to know.

Read full topic

item.title: Emotional Songs
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:22, topic:411550”][quote author=t4 link=topic=512806.msg3722802#msg3722802 date=1314058685]

[quote author=runewings317 link=topic=512806.msg3722760#msg3722760 date=1314055792]

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XP4clbHc4Xg&ob=av2e

Helps me feel better about not being gay

What? Since when were you gay?

Black Veil Brides
The Morticians Daughter (new version): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fHDJF0OdYp8
Savior: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YOGzY2ImmjQ

Celine Dion
My Heart Will Go On: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wGQ6VwUcxok

Escape The Fate
Not Good Enough For Truth And Cliche: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p4I7Ak1N2z8

Flyleaf
Fully Alive: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-d3RYW0YoEk&feature=relmfu
All Around Me: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xN0FFK8JSYE

The Elijah
Admit Defeat: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a7eJLmfpmbc
[/quote]I love Not Good Enough For Truth And Cliche <3 Savior is just boring no offense xD[quote author=t4 link=topic=512806.msg3722724#msg3722724 date=1314053817]

As I Lay Dying - Nothing Left
As I Lay Dying - Beyond Our Suffering
Escape the Fate - Gorgeous Nightmare
Falling in reverse - Goodbye Graceful

All those songs make me fucking cry cut :’)

fix’t

… Not even funny.

Shitty metalcore bands that focus on E-chugging, shrieking and emo subjects, yeah I think it’s funny.
[/quote]I think it’s funny xD And I think for the most part people don’t cut themselves unless their Demonist… And I know for sure Craig and Ronnie aren’t demonist, at most atheist. Not sure about the As I Lay Dying people…

Since when does self m mutilation have to do with religious philosophy?
[/quote]Mutilation we’re talking about here is cutting yourself. Last I checked most people don’t cut theirselves. And in the cases that I have seen, their either Satanist (demonist) or possessed. Either that or they don’t know any better or their just being dumb fucks.[/quote]
People can’t become possessed… Furthermore, people cut themselves as an attention seeking act/way to relieve emotional pain - it’s related to a personality disorder (the name slips my mind).

Read full topic

item.title: Emotional Songs
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:22, topic:411550”]Since when does self m mutilation have to do with religious philosophy?
Mutilation we’re talking about here is cutting yourself. Last I checked most people don’t cut theirselves. And in the cases that I have seen, their either Satanist (demonist) or possessed. Either that or they don’t know any better or their just being dumb fucks.[/quote]
Self Mutilation has nothing to do with being possessed, it states clear in the definition that it’s people who don’t know how to control their feelings, and don’t know how to tell someone and ask for help, it’s not easy.

Read full topic
